name: DI(V)E
description:
You are a lonely pelican that needs to catch fish to survive. Dive or die DI(V)E and eat up the orange fish, but avoid the red fish that want to catch you themselves!

Controls

Use the arrow keys to move around. The left and right keys just move you to the left and right. The up and down keys tilt your bird, and therefore affect your momentum (holding up makes your bird stall in the air or shoot up faster when exiting water, while holding down makes your bird stall in the water or shoot down faster when going into water).

Developed for One Minute Game Jam #7.
